channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Motive is next key task for police investigating Wisconsin fatal school shooting
item.description: Investigators in Wisconsin are trying to determine a motive in a school shooting that left a teacher and a student dead and two other children in critical condition.

item.title: What to know about the shooting at a Christian school in Wisconsin
Judge blocks rule preventing transgender people from changing their sex on documents
